# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a high-quality item that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $95. This price reflects the superior quality and the unique features of the product. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
